QxtPointerList Class Reference
[QxtCore module]

a list of pointers to QObjects, that cleans itself More... 

 #include <QxtPointerList>

Inherits QxtPointerListDeleter.

Inherits QList< T * >.

  • List of all members, including inherited members

Public Functions

  • QxtPointerList ( )
  • ~QxtPointerList ( )

Protected Functions

  • virtual void removeThisObject ( QObject * obj )
  • virtual void addThisObject ( QObject * obj )

Detailed Description

when you add a QObject* to this list, it will be removed from the list when the QObject is deleted.

See also: QPointer

Member Documentation

~QxtPointerList ( )

destructs the QxtPointerList




virtual void removeThisObject ( QObject * obj )

reimplement to access objects before they are removed
